title: Dollar to Mexican Peso Ex Rate
creator: Crazynova LLC

extendedInfo.description: Hola! Do you send money to Mexico often?â See & Compare Top 11 US Dollar to Mexican Peso Exchange Rates from Top Banks âForex âGold/Silver Chart âBancomer âBanamex â Banco Azteca âBX+ â HSBC âIXE âBonarte âXoom âWells Fargo âWestern Union âMoneygram âATMCashâââ #1 Downloaded New App in Popular Android Markets âââPeso provides USD to MXN Peso remit rates & trends.Peso currently shows the rates of ATM Cash, Wells Fargo, Western Union and Xoom.You would also get a feel of the trend on whether the Peso is weakening or strengthening against the Dollar.You can also add your favorite amount and track the rates for your favorite banks.Features:1. Easily track USD to MXN exchange rates of top financial institutions2. Forex Rate3. Remitted Amount Calculator4. Offline Rates Browsing.5. Bank Information like phone/email contacts, fees, charges6. Forex rate graphical trends and Bank historical rates7. Gold/Silver rate trends8. No additional account creation needed.9. Your favorite amount - Your typical transfer amount.10. Track your favorite bank rates amongst indicative and locked-in rates.11. Max rate Indication - Golden Star12. Trending colors - green for going up, red for going down.13. Interactive polls, surveys14. Free for AndroidFollow us on twitter:https://twitter.com/#!/_crazynovaRequirements:Android 2.1 and upYou need Wifi or 3G connection to download the latest exchange rates from the respective banksâââ We value and appreciate your feedback, suggestions and reviews!âââ Before writing a bad review for us, please consider writing to us at feedback@crazynova.com, we will definitely try to address your concern.Disclaimer: Please refer: http://www.crazynova.com/android_disclaimer.htmlCourtesies:Graphs: http://www.exchangerates.org.ukNews : http://www.google.comÂ©CrazyNovawww.crazynova.com
